淟字的基本解释

淟
tiǎn
〔淟涊（
ni僴 ）〕ａ．污浊，卑劣，如“切淟淟之流俗。”ｂ．热风，闷热，如：“温风淟淟。”ｃ．软弱，懦怯。

淟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiǎn］
［《廣韻》他典切，上銑，透。］
(1)污浊；卑污。参见“淟濁”。
(2)见“淟涊”。
(3)沉沦，埋没。参见“淟汩”。

淟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淟； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页630第12
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?他典切，音腆。【博雅】淟涊，垢濁也。【楚辭·遠遊】切淟涊之流俗。　又汨沒也。【唐書贊】淟汨於隋。　又【集韻】多殄切，音典。義同。

muddy
Basic explanation of words
muddy
tiǎn
〔淟涊(
ni 僴)] a. Dirty, despicable, such as "the custom of "Jie Zongzong." b. Hot wind, sultry, such as: "Warm wind is overwhelming." c. Weak and cowardly.
muddy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiǎn］
["Guangyun" he cut, milled, and penetrated. ]
(1) Dirty; dirty. See "Zongzhuo".
(2) See "淟涊".
(3) Sinking, buried. See "Jiangyu".
muddy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　淟; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 630 No. 12
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? He has a classic cut and a shy sound. [Bo Ya] 淟涊, dirty and muddy. [Songs of the Chu·Yuanyou] The custom of the cut song.　It's not too late. [Tang Shu Zan] Song Ming in the Sui Dynasty.　[Jiyun] More cuts, phonology. The same meaning.
